div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

h3.strong:
Welcome to the
Osseo-Fairchild School District

br.h4: The Mission of the Osseo-Fairchild School District, in Partnership with Our Community, is to Motivate, Educate and Empower Students for Successful Learning.

div.style: text-align: center; border: solid 4px #DE6300; padding: 16px 20px; border-radius: 20px; display: inline-block; background: #000000; margin-left: 10px;

div.p: Please consider contributing to the Curds for Kids organization. Go to: https://give.fmpfoodbank.org/campaign/curds-for-kids/c280906 Indicate that you wish the donation to go to Trempealeau County.

O-F students on the meal plan will receive free cheese curds for the week of May 4th through "Curds for Kids.". Please consider contributing. Go to:
https://give.fmpfoodbank.org/campaign/curds-for-kids/c280906
Pre-register for 4 year old kindergarten here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe9MCKuHINtsAuwJZNWkc0_ZPwxAobGiIJ2cavpfwKmiMyZAA/viewform?usp=pp_url

Superior Fresh has graciously donated Superior Fresh lettuce to our school for our breakfast/lunch program. This lettuce will be included in the delivery on Monday, April 27th. Thank you Superior Fresh for your generous donation!!
Go to the following link for cooking instructions for food included in Monday deliveries: https://5il.co/f6xh
